source.label: Info for those with normal blood pressure

cards.detail: You had a high blood pressure reading recently.  Please see your provider to lower your blood pressure and reduce your risk of stroke or other adverse events.  More severe hypertension, stage 2 hypertension is a systolic pressure of 140 mm Hg or higher or a diastolic pressure of 90 mm Hg or higher.;https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYPERTENSIONAHA.120.15021;;at-most-one;https://www.heart.org/en/health-topics/high-blood-pressure/understanding-blood-pressure-readings
